fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.arg

Interface SenderMatchingArg<V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSenderMatchingArg, ListArg, PlayerArg, WorldArg

    public interface SenderMatchingArg<V>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<V> matchOr(CommandSender sender)
      Returns all values which match the argument or the given CommandSender if argument is omitted.
      List<V> matchWithPermOr(String permission, CommandSender sender)
      Same as matchOr(CommandSender) but also check the given permission if the argument is specified.

    • Method Detail

      • matchOr

        List<V> matchOr(CommandSender sender)
        Returns all values which match the argument or the given CommandSender if argument is omitted.

      • matchWithPermOr

        List<V> matchWithPermOr(String permission,
                      CommandSender sender)
        Same as matchOr(CommandSender) but also check the given permission if the argument is specified.
